org.hibernate.search.query.engine.impl

Class QueryHits

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.query.engine.impl.QueryHits

  • public class QueryHits
extends Object
    A helper class which gives access to the current query and its hits. This class will dynamically reload the underlying TopDocs if required.
    Author:
    Hardy Ferentschik, Sanne Grinovero (C) 2011 Red Hat Inc.

      • visitDocument

        public void visitDocument(int index,
                          StoredFieldVisitor fieldVisitor)
                   throws IOException
        This document loading strategy doesn't return anything as it's the responsibility of the passed StoredFieldVisitor instance to collect the data it needs.
        Parameters:
        index - ScoreDoc index
        fieldVisitor - accessor to the stored field value in the index
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs accessing the index
